narrative.title: Provider Overview
narrative.text: Consumer Care Network, INC is a Home Health provider based in Anchorage, AK. From the 2018–2024 period, this provider received $11.7M in Medicaid payments across 146K claims.

narrative.title: Why This Matters
narrative.text: At $11.7M in Medicaid payments, this provider represents significant public healthcare spending. Understanding where these dollars go helps ensure the program serves those who need it most.
